BUY_WIZARD.TITLE: Payment
BUY_WIZARD.REGULATIONS_2: I accept the PayU account regulations
BUY_WIZARD.REGULATIONS_3: and I want to use it for subsequent payments.

FORM.CARD_NUMBER: Incorrect card number. Enter a number with no interruptions, consisting of 12-19 characters.
FORM.CARD_CVV2: Incorrect code. Enter a number from the range 000-999.
FORM.CARD_MONTH: Incorrect month number. Enter a number from 01-12.
FORM.CARD_YEAR: Incorrect year. Provide a full year, e.g. 2021.
